pathAssistantSteps.info: To move to the next stage, please select a Customer Champion for that country and mark the stage as complete.ï»¿

- If the merchant is in onboarding: the Targeted Country will automatically be 'Live' once the Head Of NewBiz validates the onboarding process

- If the merchant is in NMO: ask the Head Of to move directly the Targeted Country to the 'Live' stage

- If the merchant is already in 'Run': now that the stage is 'Ready', a NMO XBorder has been created. Ask the Head Of AM to approve the NMO XBorder, and the Targeted Country will automatically be 'Live'
